content.rendered:
Experience our

Gym

Introduction of Gym Training

It’s more significant than ever that we stay fit, healthy, & connected. Count on Kings Club Gym Training for the resources, insight, & tools you require. We offer the zestful performance, expanded functionality, & lasting durability you require to acquire the most out of each workout. It includes everything you love about any luxurious health club workout.
Our intuitive workout tracking network enables you to record data from all your favorite fitness apps with a single customizable interface of your fit lifestyle. We offer health and fitness facilities through our certifying well-qualified fitness professionals, health coaches, & other wellness experts.

Features, Amenities & Benefits

Kings Club Gym Training is specially designed to create your workout fun as well as easy. The gym is stuffed with all types of training equipment needed. There are several facilities available in all at Kings Club Gym Training such as
  • Shower facility
  • Locker rooms
  • Towels
  • Drinking-Water Bottles
  • Training equipment

Benefits

Doing exercise is always best. Here are the benefits of going to the Kings Club Gym Training:
  • Working out will decrease the chances of illness such as heart diseases, high Blood pressure, diabetes, etc.
  • You will feel good physically as well as mentally as the exercise works on the physical body & your mental health.
  • At Kings Club Gym Training, you can get trained by our health professionals and instructors who will assist you to exercise accurately & effectively.
  • Kings Club Gym Training is designed to offer you a non-conventional Training facility. We have all the machines needed for the exercises.
  • Going to the Kings Club Gym Training will enable you to feel much better as it assists in stress relief, decreases the anxiety level, & even assists you in improving your sleep quality.

Types Classes

Kings Club Gym Training is the best gyms that come under fitness studios. You will find several types of workouts that will provide you a balanced blend of workouts to enhance your health, cardiovascular strength, & more. The beginners can learn from the basic moves & the athletes can refurbish their skills & strength. You can select from the workouts as per your requirements & desired results.

About Matrix Gym Equipment Brand

  • S-Drive Power: It blends a user-driven treadmill, weighted sled, and resistance parachute and harness system in one space-saving footprint. Our target training display provides clarity metric tracking, sled-push watts tracking & an LED color wrap.
  • T7xi Treadmill
  • Ultra Converging Shoulder Press: It offers you the most advanced functionality with a creative design. It will exceed your expectations in terms of durability and design.
  • Unlock the power of MATRIX: Our resources can assist you to attain more than you ever imagined. You will find tools and expert insights to boost ROI and make a unique fitness experience.

Gallery

Testimonials

Well! I'm a member of this club I can assure u that the facilities what u get with this membership is worth every penny,Coming to the gym of this club is very well organised with best matrix equipment and a certified trainer (Pramod Gowda) is the best trainer who helps me out with all the workouts. I completely recommend to be part of this luxurious club.

Dheeraj Charan

Kings Club Gym has been awesome to me. Their trainers are exceptional, the overall vibe is great and I have had nothing but good experiences.

Nitin

Hands down, best choice I’ve made training at Kings Club. VERY friendly team who make me actually want to go train. I look forward to walking through the doors and always feel amazing when I leave.

Kumar

About Certified Gym Trainer

Pramod Gowda

Our Trainer is a well-known fitness professional from Bangalore. He has a Bachelors degree in Food and Nutrition. He has been teaching fitness classes and providing personal training sessions for more than 10 years. He has various certifications and awards. Experience analyzing patient data, including health history, goals, and injuries. Extensive practical knowledge of coaching, group instruction, CrossFit and mentoring techniques. Each student acquires personal attention and assistance.

FAQ

1. Age requirements Gym Training?
You need to be at least 14 to 15 years old, though you must refrain from heavy lifting and concentrate on doing body weight exercises, yoga etc.
2. Gym Training duration & frequency?
Each Kings Club Gym Training class is designed to be 40 minutes long. Each at our workout class can be from 10 up to 40 min long.
3. What kind of workout formats are available at gym?
You will find an extensive variety of workout formats at Kings Club Gym Training that focus on strength, muscle endurance, flexibility, stamina & balance. Select formats that assist you to attain your personal fitness goals. We ensure you that your sessions will be more fun, interesting, & less tedious for both beginner & advanced levels and focus on building strength, stamina & mobility.
4. Kinds of gym training classes?
The beginners can learn from the basic moves & the athletes can refurbish their skills & strength. You can select from the workouts as per your requirements & desired results.
5. Gym Training fee?
It’s very reasonable
6. Can I take a free trial session before I decide to buy a Kings Club membership pack?
Of course! You will get two trial sessions at no cost. Booking your trial session is super easy and can be done via our website.
7. It’s my first Gym Coaching class. What can I expect?
We are super excited and can’t wait to see you at Kings Club Gym Training and assist you to get started on your fitness journey! The trainer knows about any injuries you may have. Do your workouts at your own pace and if you feel uncomfortable, stop and let the trainer know. When your workout is done, you can talk to the trainer in case of any doubts. You might have soreness in your muscles for 2-3 days after your 1st class but it’s absolutely normal. Grab a meal that has easily digestible proteins within 30-45 mins of the workout. Avoid dairy or heavily processed protein powders. Drink 2.5-3 liters of water daily to replace the lost fluids.
8. What safety precautions will be taken at the center?
We have made the following changes in the Kings Club Gym Training facilities to ensure the safety of members as well as our employees:
  • Our center manager will check your body temperature, blood oxygen levels & status on Aarogya Setu app before entering the center.
  • Designated workout spots: Every member will be assigned a workout station number to ensure social distancing.
  • Frequent sanitization: All the workouts will be of 40 min duration. Equipment & workout floor will be sanitized after every session.
9. Do I Need to Take Dietary Supplements?
You do not require dietary supplements unless they have a documented vitamin deficiency or do not take a balanced diet. Taking supplements as an alternative to a sound diet can lead to serious deficits in the consumption of other nutrients. It is always healthier to take minerals & vitamins from food than to get them from a pill. But, serious vitamin deficiencies do occur in a small proportion of the population and supplements are useful for making improvements in vitamin status.
10. How Often Should I Work Out/Lift Weights?
Exercising only 3 days a week may be enough to improve their fitness but it will take more exercise to see further improvements. You need to lift weights only 2 to 3 times a week for basic gains in strength. Lifting weights more often are fine and the training program can be organized using easy and hard days just as with cardiovascular workouts for more advanced workouts.

Our Partners

Kings Club Gym Training is approved by Government, some specific sports council, & sports associations.
